price: Nta mudugudu n’umwe twarimbuye, uretse ko wabaga ufite igihe cyawo cyagenwe.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
